mosinstall.name: JooTabs
mosinstall.author: Ricardo Sousa and Andy Sikumbang
mosinstall.description:
Exhausted to waste space in your Joomla! powered website with a lot of modules?
Put a lot of modules in just one position using jooTabs
Features :

  1. Option to change active tab with mouseover or mouseclick
  2. 8 ready-to-use tab template
  3. Up to 10 tab available
  4. Option to use AutoChange of the Tabs and the delay time of each transition
  5. Option to change the width of tabs
  6. Option to choose which tab that you want to open after first page loading (to attract users attention)
  7. Assign specific module into each tab
  8. Set the title of each tab
  9. Option to show or hide the modules title inside the tabs
  10. Module Class Suffix ready
  11. Show everything: Images, Scripts, Links... inside the tabs ;)

Tested in all common Browsers: IE 6+; Firefox 1.0+; Opera 7+ // The Joomla 1.5 version is on progress
If you found this module useful you may want to rate and comment JooTabs at extensions.joomla.org
Based on: EASY TABS 1.2 Produced and Copyright by Koller Juergen www.kollermedia.at | www.austria-media.at
